game.name: Transilio
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Retro-style frenzy awaits as you dash through demon-filled dungeons in this fast-paced top-down dungeon crawler.
